 2020-06442020-09-04LAB,  ESDC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Labour Standards Regulations (Number of Weeks)
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADA LABOUR STANDARDS REGULATIONS in order to ensure that employees in the federally regulated sector that are unable or unavailable to work as a result of COVID-19 are able to continue to take job-protected leave without risking disciplinary action from their employer.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0191 Publication Date: 2020-09-16
AttachmentsAttachment
